level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 20-676 Definitions. As used in this subchapter, the following terms shall mean and include: (a) "Pickled." Preserved by soaking in a curing solution. (b) "Pumped." Injected with a curing solution through the veins, arteries or muscular structure. (c) "Curing solution." A liquid solution for the pickling or curing of meats.
